description.text: Bali Horse Riding and Kintamani Tour is part of Bali Combination Tour Packages program we have by give you opportunity riding a horse in beautiful beach through white sands with duration 1 hours 30 minutes ride and then continue the tour to visit kintamani village for see the view of mount batur volcano from the distance, and then you will enjoy delicious lunch in kintamani village while overlooking the amazing view of mount batur volcano. After lunch finish we continue the tour to visit the beautiful rice terrace at tegalalang village, is famous rice terrace and good place for taking picture with background rice paddy, and then continue to visit Tirta Empul temple or most know as Tampak siring temple, is holy spring water temple and lot of local Hindu people come here for take the holy water for bless good fortune. After that we go back to your hotel with bring awesome experience featured in this Bali Horse Riding and Kintamani Tour. The following is short portrayal of spots of investment we will be visit amid this astounding horseback riding and volcano perspective visit packages.

description.text: Kintamani, Batur and Penelokan towns sit on the edge of the monstrous Batur caldera around 1,500m above sea level, and offer exciting points of view of the element wellspring of fluid magma Mount Batur and peaceful Lake Batur. The essential interest for visitors is spotted around Lake Batur where Penelokan town gives grand viewpoints of this pit lake and Mount Batur, set in a boundless volcanic caldera. Photo opportunities prosper. Kintamani domain is the most settled extent to have been recorded in history of Bali. It was in all probability on account of its to a great degree awakening trademark view

description.text: Tegallalang is a balinese local village located in the north of Ubud village, this village have amazing view of Rice Terrace and small valley, this village most visited by guest after do some Kintamani Tour to Mount Batur Volcano View and stop here to take picture and enjoy the fresh air from the scenery. Is great place to stop, i here also have small cafe, you can have some drink while enjoy the view of rice terrace. We will visit this village after see the view of Kintamani volcano, our driver will be asist you to take picture with background of Rice Terrace.

title.title: Tirta Empul Temple | Bali Horse Riding and Kintamani Tour

image.title: Bali Horse Riding and Kintamani Tour | Tirta Empul Temple | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Tirta Empul Temple is constructed around the sacred spring at Tampak Siring. perpect stop to visit this sanctuary after visit fountain of liquid magma at Kintamani. For more than a thousand years, Balinese admirers have been drawn to tirta Empul Temple whose consecrated spring is said to have been made by Indra and to have healing properties. The convention proceeds with practically unaltered at the sanctuary today. More than 1000 years of age, the sanctuary and its two showering spots have been utilized by the individuals for good wellbeing and thriving due to the spring water's healing forces.

price.title: Bali Horse Riding and Kintamani Tour Price :
price.content:
Bali Horse Riding and Kintamani Tour Price : 

  • 1 Person : IDR 1,650,000 (Solo Traveler)
  • 2 Person : IDR 1,300,000/person
  • 3 Person : IDR 1,200,000/person
  • 4 Person : IDR 1,100,000/person
  • 5 Person or More : IDR 1,050,000/person

Note :

  • Get special price for group booking
  • Maksimun weight can ride the horse is 90 kg, over than that is not allowed to ride the horse

Bali Horse Riding and Kintamani Tour Price Include :

  • Private and Comfortable A/C Car
  • Professional English Speaking Driver
  • Petrol
  • 1 Hours Horse Riding
  • Mineral Water
  • Lunch Indonesian Food
  • Entrance Ticket
  • Insurance Coverage during Horse Riding

itinerary.title: Bali Horse Riding and Kintamani Tour Packages Itinerary :

content.event: Enjoy 1 Hours Horse Back Riding Tour Packages
Visit Kintamani Village for Volcano View
Visit Tegalalang Rice Terrace
Visit Tirta Empul Temple

inclusion:
Seminyak, Legian, Kuta, Nusa Dua, Jimbaran, Pecatu, Sanur, Ubud, Canggu, Denpasar, Benoa Harbour, Airport
Please contact us for pick up in different area

• The price already include with 21% Government tax and Services
  • Get special price for group booking
  • The tour is Private Tours, means there is no other participant, just only you and your companion
  • The Tour will assist by English Speaking Tours Driver
  • Tour Guide can be requested, contact us if you want to request Tour Guide during the trip
  • Time and Tourism site is subject to change based on your request.
  • Use contact form provide to send us message, asking information or make tour booking request.

• Payment is Cash Payment
  • Payment is on the day itself with our driver
  • Payment with other currency will convert based on daily exchange rate
